title: Strawberry toasted pecan and Gorgonzola salad

ingredients.item: 225g pack essential Waitrose Strawberries, hulled and thickly sliced

instructions.step: Warm a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Add the pecans and cook, turning them frequently, for 3â€“5 minutes until lightly toasted.
Mix the olive oil, red wine vinegar, basil and shallot together in the base of a large salad bowl. Season to taste, bearing in mind that the cheese you are adding is quite salty.
Place the strawberries into the bowl together with the rocket salad, warm pecans and Gorgonzola. Toss well and serve immediately with crusty bread.
